## üîÑ Data Flow

### Experience Selection Flow
```
1. User opens app ‚Üí ExperienceSelectionScreen
2. FutureProvider fetches experiences from API
3. User taps card ‚Üí toggleSelection() ‚Üí provider state updates
4. UI rebuilds with selection state
5. User enters description ‚Üí setDescription() ‚Üí state updates
6. User clicks Next ‚Üí State logged ‚Üí Navigate to OnboardingScreen
```

### Onboarding Flow
```
1. User navigates from ExperienceScreen ‚Üí OnboardingQuestionScreen
2. User taps Record Audio ‚Üí startAudioRecording() ‚Üí UI shows recorder
3. Waveform displays during recording
4. User taps Stop ‚Üí stopAudioRecording(path) ‚Üí Saves file, updates state
5. RecordedItemWidget appears with Play/Delete options
6. User can tap Play ‚Üí Plays audio with just_audio
7. User can tap Delete ‚Üí Deletes file ‚Üí Clears state ‚Üí Button reappears
8. Similarly for Video: tap, record, stop, play, delete
9. User enters text ‚Üí setAnswerText() ‚Üí State updates
10. User clicks Next ‚Üí Navigate to next screen
```
